alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cleburne; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Talladega, southwestern Calhoun and southwestern Cleburne Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 852 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mount Cheaha to near Parkdale. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Talladega, Sylacauga, Childersburg, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Lincoln, Riverside, Vincent, Harpersville, Munford, Hobson City, Oak Grove, Waldo, Bon Air, Alpine Bay Resort, Winterboro, Talladega Superspeedway, Anniston Regional Airport and Talladega Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and east central Alabama.
